description:
The haXe "demo" was the original test bed for porting the haXe development framework to webOS. The port has been a success!

You can view games which have been created using haXe, like MineHX, Hoops, Whack A Mole and Paper Basketball. Even more are coming!

haXe applications for webOS can cross-compile to Flash or webOS, or even iPhone, Android, Windows, Mac OS or Linux.

Please feel free to try any of the other haXe-based games, or to download and try out this physics demonstration! Press 1-6 on your keyboard to initiate different physics simulations. Tap your screen to fire blocks to mix things up. Tests 2-6 are connected to the accelerometer, so tip your phone to play with gravity.
